p:
This is the third coronavirus outbreak in as many decades.
7 The previous two were severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) in 2003, and Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) in 2012 which had mortality rates of 10% and 37%, respectively.
8 The mortality rate of SARS-CoV-2, â€“ although lower compared to SARS and MERS, seems to have a more devastating effect globally.
